import React from "react"; import {connect} from "react-redux"; import "./styles.css"; import { DELETE_MODULE, CREATE_MODULE, UPDATE_MODULE, updateModule, clickedModule, createModule, deleteModule } from "../actions/moduleActions"; import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; var clickedModuleId; const ModuleList = ( { course, modules=[], deleteModule, createModule, updateModule}) =>

Modules for {course.title}

    { modules.map(module => ( module.highlight &&
  • { module.editing && updateModule({...module, title: event.target.value}) } value={module.title}/> } { !module.editing && {module.title} }
    • ) || ( !module.highlight &&
  • clickedModule(module)}key={module._id}> { module.editing && updateModule({...module, title: event.target.value}) } value={module.title}/> } { !module.editing && {module.title} }
    • ) ) }
// export default ModuleList const stateToPropertyMapper = (state) => ({ modules: state.moduleReducer.modules, course: state.courseReducer.course, }) const propertyToDispatchMapper = (dispatch) => ({ deleteModule: (module) => deleteModule(dispatch, module), createModule: (course, module) => createModule(dispatch, course, module), updateModule: (module) => updateModule(dispatch, module), clickedModule: (module) => clickedModule(dispatch, module) }) export default connect (stateToPropertyMapper, propertyToDispatchMapper) (ModuleList)
